AccountingModelConfigName.description: The name of the accounting set.

Comment.description: The description of the transaction journal record.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Specifies the type of currency. Possible values are your personal (if set) or your corporate currency.

DueDate.description: The date when the transaction is due.

FundAccountRecordIdValue.description: The value of the fund account record identifier.

FundAccountValue.description: The value of the fund account.

GeneralLedgerCode.description: The code of the associated general ledger.

IsAccrualJournalEntry.description: Determines whether the record is an accrual journal entry (true) or not (false).

IsAdjustmentJournalEntry.description: Determines whether the record is an adjustment journal entry (true) or not (false).

IsHistoricalJournalEntry.description: Determines whether the record is a historical journal entry (true) or not (false).

IsRelatedJournalEntry.description: Determines whether the record is a related journal entry (true) or not (false).

IsWriteOffJournalEntry.description: Determines whether the record is a write-off journal entry (true) or not (false).

JournalReason.description: Specifies the reason for the journal record.

PrimaryRecordIdValue.description: The value of the primary record identifier.

SecondaryRecordIdValue.description: The value of the secondary record identifier.
